text_block_list.text:
A few days after signing the contract to officially be 
in charge of Mejiro Palmer, a mock race was held. 
Mejiro Palmer's performance, however ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa… ugh…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ah… that didn't go too well. Sorry!! Even though 
you're putting so much effort into training me.
choice_data_list: <size=32>Struggling to find that feeling from the Freestyle Race?</size>
<size=32>Struggling to find that feeling from the Freestyle Race?</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: … Haha, yep, you got me. During the freestyle, my mind went completely blank and that sort of happened. But now that I'm back here ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I'm here as a Mejiro horsegirl, training at the prestigious 
Tracen academy… Because of that, you know… I've been 
thinking about all sorts of things.

… Of course, it's only natural. The way of running that has 
been ingrained in her since childhood is not something that 
can be easily changed. Additionally ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… But hey, watch me. After all, I'm a Mejiro horsegirl as well. 
If I don't show my resolve here, it'd disgrace our great name, 
isn't that right?

Beneath her cheerful façade, she embodied 
a strong sense of earnestness and responsibility. 
As a result of that ——
choice_data_list: <size=38>(Perhaps she can't escape her Mejiro name.)</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Ah, this is bad, really bad! At this rate, I'll end 
up causing trouble for the trainer who kindly took 
me under their wing! But what should I do…?)
—— UWAAAAHHHH!! I'M SO BUMMED OUT RIGHT NOW!! I can't believe it! My lady's basically ghosting me～! I'm at my limit! I am soooooo done～～～!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, uh… are you okay? I don't really know 
what's going on, but if you're worried about 
something, maybe we can talk about it?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: —— THA'S IT!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: WOOOOOOOH～～～! I sang the living hell out of that! My throat's ded, yo! C'mon, Palmer girl, show us what you've got～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Yo, uh… where did your worries go?!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Well, y'know, you've pretty much listened to them all! 
Nothing left but to vibe it up, yaaa? Weee～iii☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Oh m'god, I saw this on the 'gram! It's hella fire! Right? 
I'm so in love with this color! Gonna buy～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Pfft… ahaha! That was such a quick decision!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Soooo good～～～!! Seriously, this is bussin' hard! Burgers are goated! WOOOOO～～～☆

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahhahaha!! Seriously… Helios, you look like 
you're always having so much fun!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Looks like? I mean, yaaa, 'course, 'cause it is!! For reals!! 
My vibes are always on point, know what I mean～??

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
But that's the goal, right? Why not have fun? 
Gets you hyped, yaa? And nothing beats that～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Haha, I see, I see. Yeah, you're right about that. 
… I like your way of thinking — nice and simple!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Simple! Ya got it! That's the WOOOOO～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Ahahah. "Fun, hyped, vibes, nothing beats that"…… hmm.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Whew, okay…! I think it's time to wrap things up… Oh…?
(WAAAAHHHHHHH!!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Oh, that's Helios participating in the mock race.)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hahh, hahh…… AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
WEI, WEI, WEI, WEI, WEEEEEIII～～～IIIII!! 
SPRINT LIKE NO TOMORROW～～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Seriously? That girl is…… laughing, during the race?)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! GO-GO-GO-GOOOOOO!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Wow, that's impressive. ……That Helios is really amazing.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(I wonder why. Even standing still here… my heart is beating 
so loudly, it's almost as if I'm right in the middle of running ——)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Helios!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, Pam! No way, you were watching? 
That's sooo dope～! Love you～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah…… yeah, I was watching! That was a great race! 
And you know… um, hey!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Tell me one thing… Helios, what 
do you think about while racing?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, while racing? 
Well, of course ——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Raise the roof! Run like fireworks!! Have the most fun!!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Legit, could anything be better?!! 
But why you ask?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: …… Oh, no reason. It's really nothing, but yeah ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: I like the sound of that. Nice & simple!! Awesome!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's it — simple! You got it, for real! 
That's just all the WOOOOOO～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Wooooooo～～～～!!! … Pfft, ahahahahahahaha!!
